akas: Mi patria eres tú Mexico (alternative title)
Mi vida eres tú Uruguay (dubbed version)
akas from release info: Mi patria eres tú Mexico (alternative title)
Mi vida eres tú Uruguay (dubbed version)

1.title: 32.Bölüm
1.plot: Cevdet wakes up to a nightmare. Treaty of Sevres was signed. Cevdet's family was tested with many hardships. Commander Filippos rules Izmir with an iron fist. Cevdet has to stop a new sneaky plot.

2.title: 33.Bölüm
2.plot: Cevdet returns his duty but becomes Dagistanli's enemy. Azize makes a plan to see Cevdet. Azize's past lightens. Cevdet has difficulty in overcoming with his daughters. It is time for reunion of Hilal and Leon.

3.title: 34.Bölüm
3.plot: Filippos' attack sets Dagistanli against other efes*. Azize is charged with treason by Dagistanli. Yildiz and Yakup marry by Cevdet's force. It's time for Hilal. But the danger closes to them.

4.title: 35.Bölüm
4.plot: Hilal's kidnapping stirs. Leon says Halit Ikbal's true identity to Cevdet. Azize faces Tevfik. Filippos prepares for a victory in Tasköprü. Cevdet has to save Hilal and Tasköprü. But Dagistanli and Filippos have their own secret plans.

5.title: 36.Bölüm
5.plot: Tevfik divorces Azize for her trust. Government of Ankara plans to receive guns from Russia for Tasköprü but it is interrupted just in time with Filippos' secret plan. Cevdet has to find Filippos' trump. Hilal and Leon take a big step but danger waits for them.

6.title: 37.Bölüm
6.plot: Bolshevists' help to Turks comes out and people that blames Ankara for getting help from heretics. Filippos decides to punish Russia for the help to Turks and heads out after Bolshevists in the Greek Army. Leon faces the risk of being disclosed.

7.title: 38.Bölüm
7.plot: Filippos invites Sadrazam Damat Ferit Pasa to Izmir. Ankara calls Dagistanli for regular army. Dagistanli wants help from Cevdet and sends Yanik Efe to kill Damat Ferit.

8.title: 39.Bölüm
8.plot: Ismet Pasa comes to Izmir to take the soldiers from him. Cevdet understands that he shouldn't rely upon Dagistanli and plans with Ismet Pasa. Tevfik falls in to the hands of Cevdet but Cevdet has a more important thing than his revenge.

9.title: 40.Bölüm
9.plot: Dagistanli breaks ties with Ankara and takes hostage Ismet Bey. Azize becomes leader of Hemsireler Birligi. Mehmet comes to an end and makes a plan before his death. Cevdet's missions are saving Ismet Bey and bringing efeler* to regular army.

10.title: 41.Bölüm
10.plot: Istanbul Goverment requests a meeting with Ankara committee. But Cevdet realizes the ambush and decides to use Tevfik to remove. Cevdet faces with Tevfik and learns the truth about Azize.

11.title: 42.Bölüm
11.plot: Tevfik haggles for his freedom in return for Azize's life with Cevdet. On the other hand Cevdet has to save Dagistanli from prison but someone else wants to do it too. Tevfik comes to an end. Cevdet races against time for Azize's life.

12.title: 43.Bölüm
12.plot: The family reunites. Filippos decides to a great attack. Cevdet's plan is the only way to Turkish victory. But Cevdet tries to learn what happened to Azize. Cevdet is at a crossroads. It will decide to battle's fate.

13.title: 44.Bölüm
13.plot: Cevdet takes Azize's revenge but his plans collapses. He is dismissed from Greek Attack. Azize tries to save Cevdet but her identity endangers all family.

14.title: 45.Bölüm
14.plot: With Dagistanli's treason, Greeks wins the battle. Azize returns Izmir with her baby. Filippos enjoys the victory but Mustafa Kemal comes to Western Front to give moral support. Dagistanli blames Mustafa Kemal for what happened to him and decides to kill him. When Cevdet tries to stop him, another danger comes to Cevdet.

15.title: 46.Bölüm
15.plot: Filippos discovers the truth about Cevdet, Azize and family decides to move from Izmir but Cevdet is arrested.

16.title: 47.Bölüm
16.plot: Cevdet, convicted of execution; An important step is taken for the National Struggle. Cevdet and Ismet Pasha come together for the course of the National Struggle. This meeting is learned by the Greek Army. Greek Commander Filippos learns that Cevdet, whom he trusts, has betrayed them. Filippos wants Cevdet to be arrested and executed immediately. Izmir is now dangerous for Cevdet's family. Azize is ready to grab all the danger to save Cevdet. Cevdet suffers from Greek torture during his imprisonment.

17.title: 48.Bölüm
17.plot: Cevdet and Leon face each other. The resistance in Izmir is getting bigger and bigger.

18.title: 49.Bölüm
18.plot: Filippos and the others find out Hilal and Leon's marriage. Hilal and Leon faces their love's impossibility again. Cevdet and Mehmet Akif unites forces against Filippos' plan.

19.title: 50.Bölüm
19.plot: Second Turkish victory comes true in Inönü. King of Greece, Konstantin comes Izmir after Inönü fiasco and commands to Filippos for army's withdrawal. Azize goes nearby villages to help for women. Turkish Army walks to Izmir but an information in the last minute, determines Turkish Army's fate.

20.title: 51.Bölüm
20.plot: Hilal is shot after the plan of Greek Army Commander Filippos and Adonis. This main witness, Leon, lifts him to the hospital and begins the critical process for Hilal. Cevdet and Azize are destroyed by this news. Cevdet suffers the pain of what they could not tell Hilal, who was fighting for life. Cevdet, who can not tell Hilal to actually works for Kuva-yi Milliye, can not bear this burden any more. Adonis, who aims to kill Hilal lying at the hospital, once again tries to kill Hilal.

21.title: 52.Bölüm
21.plot: The agent appointed by the Istanbul Government is trying to change the course of the National Struggle. It is time to reevaluate everything again for Hilal after being shot. Hilal, the target of Greek Commander Filippos and Greek colonel Adonis, will have to re-eye her relations with Leon after being shot. This incident seems to be about how much Turkish-Greek love might be possible in a war. Cevdet follows the guy who did this to Hilal. Filippos is aware that Adonis will become a target and will give him a final task before he runs away.

22.title: 53.Bölüm
22.plot: The withdrawal decision is being taken for the Turkish Army; The Greeks are based on Eskisehir. Greek Commander Filippos, with the agent he has placed in the Turkish Army, allows him to fight on two fronts. In addition, Filippos, who wants to take advantage of the turmoil in the army, moves forward step by step. The Greek Army seizes Kütahya with the support of invading states. Against the Greeks who are heading towards Eskisehir, the Ankara Government takes a new decision. This decision is the withdrawal of the Turkish Army after the damages it received.

23.title: 54.Bölüm
23.plot: While Kütahya-Eskisehir defeats stuck like a knife in the heart of the nation, Cevdet and his family were shaken by the loss of Hasibe. Cevdet is determined to keep his promise at his mother's end, at any cost. However, Cevdet, who is blinded by his vision, will frighten Azize, who will do it for this purpose.

24.title: 55.Bölüm
24.plot: Yakup is exposed to the torture of the Greeks; It is making a critical decision for the future of the Turkish nation. Cevdet has to watch what happened to Yakup in order to avoid doubt. Yildiz who learns that Yakup is a powerhouse searches the way to save Havva. Vecihi, who is working with Leon to get back the plane that caused Yakup to be arrested, will return with something different. Filippos resorted to a method that was inconceivable to solve Yakup, who resisted not to speak.

25.title: 56.Bölüm
25.plot: Filippos, who sees Cevdet with his own eyes seeing Yakup, prefers to confine Cevdet to the eye instead of arresting or punishing him. Thus, he will learn about Ankara's plans in advance. As a matter of fact, the information obtained by Filippos primarily threatens the lives of all the women there including Darülmesai and Azize. A dangerous game will begin between Cevdet and Filippos.

26.title: 57.Bölüm
26.plot: Cevdet's family learns the secret duty; There is a new turn in the National Struggle. Cevdet intends to launch the wick of a massive attack all over Izmir. Cevdet puts the plan into practice while the increasingly worsening situation in Sakarya is returning to death race. At the same time, Aleksi is close to his father after Havva's death and is inciting him against Leon. This effort will bring Leon to the brink of death.

27.title: 58.Bölüm
27.plot: Cevdet's duty in Greek army is over. Filippos wants him and mourns for his son Aleksi. Azize, Yildiz and Hilal tries to run away from Izmir. Leon loses Filippos' trust. Cevdet is captured by Greeks and Filippos has a trump to make him speak.

28.title: 59.Bölüm - Final
28.plot: Azize and Cevdet sacrifice themselves. Hilal, Leon, Yildiz and Yakup seal their fates in the front.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Cevdet is betrayed by his blood brother, Tevfik. Cevdet is a major in Thessaloniki towards the end of the Balkan War. A brave soldier for the motherland, a love lover for his wife Azize; his children Ali Kemal, a compassionate father to Yildiz and Hilal.

2.title: 1. Bölüm
2.plot: Cevdet is betrayed by his blood brother, Tevfik. Cevdet is a major in Thessaloniki towards the end of the Balkan War. A brave soldier for the motherland, a love lover for his wife Azize; his children Ali Kemal, a compassionate father to Yildiz and Hilal. When Cevdet and Tevfik battle on the front, everything upset with an event. Cevdet is forced to break from his family. Tevfik helps Azize, who had to migrate from Thessaloniki to Izmir.

3.title: 2.Bölüm
3.plot: Cevdet's return as a Greek colonel shakes all family and Tevfik up. The family is disappointed with his treachery except his elder daughter Yildiz. It won't be easy to regain his family for Cevdet.

4.title: 3.Bölüm
4.plot: Tevfik is unaware of leaving hint in the mosque. Azize wants to divorce Cevdet. Cevdet accepts with one condition. She gets disappointed because he gives up easily. Cevdet's treachery endangers his family.

5.title: 4.Bölüm
5.plot: After the fire Cevdet makes an important decision and brings his family to Greek Mansion. On the other hand, Cevdet chases Eftalya. Tevfik endangers Cevdet's life.

6.title: 6.Bölüm
6.plot: Cevdet faces death with Tevfik's trap. Azize worries about Ali Kemal and she decides to espouse Yildiz for avoiding from Leon. Hilal makes a dangerous plan. Leon is fighting for his life alone after the attack.

7.title: 7.Bölüm
7.plot: Cevdet's decision puts Cevdet and Tevfik on the spot. Azize comes face to face with death. Hilal and Leon come across, it becomes important milestone of their lives.

8.title: 8.Bölüm
8.plot: Cevdet has to get rid of Hasan the Immortal. Tevfik is undecided about Azize. Turkish public become hopeful with Amasya Circular but The Allies sends help to Greeks. Cevdet's duty is destroying the arsenal.

9.title: 9.Bölüm
9.plot: Hasan the Immortal is seized. Leon's doubts about Cevdet confuse Vasili's mind. Cevdet tries to learn the guns' place from him but Hasan threatens Cevdet with uncover him. Hasan the Immortal intends to give a secret to Azize.

10.title: 10.Bölüm
10.plot: Hilal and Mehmet arrests for exploding Greek arsenal. Everyone is shocked Vasili's execution decision for Hilal. Cevdet is grieved because his daughter gets punishment for his crime.

11.title: 11.Bölüm
11.plot: Cevdet and all family try to save Hilal. Halide Edip comes to Izmir and becomes hope for Azize. Cevdet has a last ditch for saving his daughter.

12.title: 12.Bölüm
12.plot: Cevdet's plan works, Esref takes hostage Leon when he tries to save Hilal. Vasili endangers Leon's life and orders to Cevdet to kill Esref. Eftalya learns everything about Tevfik and goes to Azize to tell.

13.title: 13.Bölüm
13.plot: Cevdet learns Tevfik is the traitor he was looking for. Their rivalry becomes different. Azize is decisive about Yildiz's marriage but Yildiz hopes Leon's help.

14.title: 14. Bolum
14.plot: Cevdet prepares to return his family. He wants his Ottoman uniform from Azize. But a letter comes from Mustafa Kemal, changes everything.

15.title: 15.Bölüm
15.plot: Vasili orders to exile Turk families. When Cevdet tries to protect his family, Azize makes a surprise decision. Hilal and her friends decides to protest Greek vice prime minister's coming.

16.title: 16.Bölüm
16.plot: Costas wants to exile Cevdet. Azize says she will keep her promise to Tevfik. Tevfik is happy about Cevdet's state. Hilal wants to make herself heard to Costas and goes to the ball. Leon stands in her way with dance.

17.title: 17.Bölüm
17.plot: Cevdet has to kill Esref to believe the Greeks to himself. But Esref threatens him to reveal Cevdet's spying. Cevdet has to give a decision. Leon can't hide his feelings to Hilal anymore.

18.title: 18.Bölüm
18.plot: Cevdet is awarded with generalship. Meanwhile English agent arrives. Azize accepts to organize female resisters gladly. Charles and Esref have plans for Tevfik. Yildiz follows Hilal closely. Ali Kemal wants to chasten his father Cevdet.

19.title: 19.Bölüm
19.plot: Charles sends a offer Esref and charges Tevfik to wipe off communication between Anadolu and Izmir. Hilal is stuck in between love, country and siblings. She takes irreversible step.

20.title: 20.Bölüm
20.plot: While Cevdet tries to overcome plots of Charles, he tries to save Ali Kemal and Hilal. Veronica finds Leon's love letter to Hilal but it causes misunderstanding. Hasibe notices Azize's pregnancy and thinks Cevdet has right to know that.

21.title: 21.Bölüm
21.plot: Cevdet is looking for Esref's testament. Vasili commands to Cevdet to show round of Esref's funeral in the city. Leon gives his letter to Hilal. But according to Hilal, there is more important obstacles than Yildiz.

22.title: 22.Bölüm
22.plot: Cevdet Tevfik learns Cevdet's true face. Sivas Congress is announced. Charles makes new plans. Hilal tries to stop her feelings. Vasili organizes a surprise engagement for Yildiz and Leon. Azize and Tevfik prepares for marriage.

23.title: 23.Bölüm
23.plot: Yildiz gets lost after Leon's rejecting her. The Turkish arsenal has to move to Afyon but it is impossible. The person that will help Cevdet for this duty is Azize. Leon has to decide between his love and duty.

24.title: 24.Bölüm
24.plot: The guns reach to Afyon. Azize is the main suspect. Tevfik's new duty is inciting patriots. Cevdet has to save Yakup from Charles's trap. Leon can't forgive himself and decides to commit suicide.

25.title: 25.Bölüm
25.plot: Civil war starts in Izmir. Kara Fatma stands by Cevdet and Yakup to answer for Riza Bey's travel to Istanbul. Charles and Tevfik join forces with Vasili. Greek Army learns Leon's treason. Hilal and Ali Kemal decide to help him to flee.

26.title: 26.Bölüm
26.plot: Cevdet learns the truth about Tevfik. He decides to take revenge but first makes a plan for Riza Bey to change his decision. Azize gets involved and kidnaps. Leon has a pending court martial. Hilal tries to stop the execution.

27.title: 27.Bölüm
27.plot: Charles doesn't give in after Misak-i Milli. He collaborates with Vasili for a secret and bloody plan. Azize goes to a Yoruk village for help. A bad surprise waits Azize.

28.title: 28.Bölüm
28.plot: The massacre is told everywhere. Vasili defames Kuvva about this. Cevdet makes a plan with Azize. Tevfik is unaware of coming to his end. Leon is tested with Hilal's life by Vasili.

29.title: 29.Bölüm
29.plot: Tevfik kidnaps Azize and gives Esref's testament to Vasili. Vasili is on the verge of learning identity of the traitor in Greek army.

30.title: 30.Bölüm
30.plot: Vasili stalemates Cevdet with his family. Cevdet plays his last ace Ali Kemal for saving his family. Vasili faces the truth of his lost son Dimitri.

31.title: 31.Bölüm
31.plot: Vasili is executed for being traitor. Leon and Ali Kemal have tough times. Cevdet makes a important decision for his country. Unexpected things wait for Azize and Veronica.

imdb.plot outline: Azize finds herself with her 3 children and mother-in-law in a difficult fight. She raises her children while fighting the difficulties of the war period and her husband's absence whom she loves more than anything. It's about war, love, greed, treason and sacrifice.
imdb.title: Wounded Love
plot: Azize finds herself with her 3 children and mother-in-law in a difficult fight. She raises her children while fighting the difficulties of the war period and her husband's absence whom she loves more than anything. It's about war, love, greed, treason and sacrifice.::ahmetkozan

General Cevdet, once a Turkish General, got into a bad plot by the Turkish army, some kind of personal betrayal. He joins the Greek army as a General. People think that he's a traitor, however he actually works as an undercover General. An epic of conflicting patriotic emotional events versus family, friends, love and commitment.
